registry.h

00001 #ifndef PSE51_REGISTRY_H
00002 #define PSE51_REGISTRY_H
00003 
00004 #include <stdarg.h>
00005 #include <nucleus/synch.h>
00006 #include <posix/posix.h>
00007 
00008 #define PSE51_MAXNAME 64
00009 
00010 /* A pse51_node_t is the holder to be added to each object which needs to be put
00011    in the registry. */
00012 typedef struct pse51_node {
00013     unsigned magic;
00014     unsigned flags;             /* PSE51_NODE_PARTIAL_INIT. */
00015     unsigned refcount;
00016     xnsynch_t *completion_synch;
00017     /* pse51_unlink_t *dest_hook; */
00018 
00019     struct pse51_node *next;
00020     struct pse51_node **prev;
00021     char name[PSE51_MAXNAME];
00022 } pse51_node_t;
00023 
00024 int pse51_reg_pkg_init(unsigned objects_count, unsigned maxfds);
00025 
00026 void pse51_reg_pkg_cleanup(void);
00027 
00028 /* Get an existing node: oflags are POSIX open style flags.
00029    If 0 is returned and (*nodep) is NULL, then a new node should be added
00030    with node_add*. */
00031 int pse51_node_get(pse51_node_t **nodep,
00032                    const char *name,
00033                    unsigned long magic,
00034                    long oflags);
00035 
00036 /* bind a node : use node_add for simple objects (eg. sem_open), node_add_start
00037    and node_add_finished for objects which need to be initialized outside of any
00038    critical sections (eg. mq_open). */
00039 int pse51_node_add(pse51_node_t *node, const char *name, unsigned magic);
00040 
00041 int pse51_node_add_start(pse51_node_t *node,
00042                          const char *name,
00043                          unsigned magic,
00044                          xnsynch_t *competion_synch);
00045 
00046 void pse51_node_add_finished(pse51_node_t *node, int error);
00047 
00048 /* Any successful call to node_get or node_add need to be paired with a call
00049    node_put before a node may be unlinked. */
00050 int pse51_node_put(pse51_node_t *node);
00051 
00052 /* Remove the binding of a node to its name, if the node is still referenced,
00053    real destruction is deferred until the last call to node_put. */
00054 int pse51_node_remove(pse51_node_t **nodep, const char *name, unsigned magic);
00055 
00056 #define PSE51_NODE_REMOVED 2
00057 
00058 #define pse51_node_ref_p(node) ((node)->refcount)
00059 
00060 #define pse51_node_removed_p(node) \
00061     ((node)->flags & PSE51_NODE_REMOVED && !pse51_node_ref_p(node))
00062 
00063 /* A pse51_desc_t is the structure associated with a descriptor.  */
00064 typedef struct pse51_desc {
00065     pse51_node_t *node;
00066     long flags;
00067     int fd;
00068 } pse51_desc_t;
00069 
00070 int pse51_desc_create(pse51_desc_t **descp, pse51_node_t *node);
00071 
00072 int pse51_desc_get(pse51_desc_t **descp, int fd, unsigned magic);
00073 
00074 int pse51_desc_destroy(pse51_desc_t *desc);
00075 
00076 #define pse51_desc_setflags(desc, fl) ((desc)->flags = (fl))
00077 
00078 #define pse51_desc_getflags(desc) ((desc)->flags)
00079 
00080 #define pse51_desc_node(desc) ((desc)->node)
00081 
00082 #define pse51_desc_fd(desc) ((desc)->fd)
00083 
00084 #define PSE51_PERMS_MASK  (O_RDONLY | O_WRONLY | O_RDWR)
00085 
00086 #endif /* PSE51_REGISTRY_H */
